Service Details: - Offers resources and services for individuals, children and families in Penticton and the South Okanagan/Similkameen in the areas of childcare and support services; child, youth and family support programs; community living services for adults with developmental disabilities; and community capacity building- Programs and services include a continuum of childcare programs for children birth to 12 years (daycare, preschool, after school care), services for children and adults with disabilities, counselling and support for families, handyDART service (Penticton & Summerland), Harm Reduction, Better at Home Penticton (services for seniors), and a community directory
Major Intersection: Ellis St and Wade Ave E
